transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello, haan ji.
Executive: Hello, good morning sir.
Customer: Morning.
Executive: Roshan ji baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: Mahavir Industries se.
Customer: Haan ji bhai sahab bolo, aap IndiaMART se bol rahe ho?
Executive: Ji ji Roshan ji, Vansh Grover baat kar raha hu aapka account manager IndiaMART se.
Customer: Bataiye.
Executive: Chaliye, first of all welcome to the IndiaMART family.
Customer: Batao batao vaise main thoda busy hu, bataiye aap kya kaam hai.
Executive: Ji sir, sir video meeting ek arrange karni thi welcome call ke liye jo hota hai apne client ko. Aapko thoda main discussion karna tha IndiaMART ke services ke hisaab se aapko.
Customer: Suno meri baat, suno meri baat. Maine subah ka phone switch off kar rakha, abhi on kiya isko.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Mere ko problem hai ghar pe, main aaj free nahi hu, kal aap mere pe jab marzi phone kar lo aap.
Executive: Achha aaj aapko bilkul 15 minute ka time bhi nahi mil payega sir aapko?
Customer: Nahi, main kehta hu main busy hu, mere ghar pe problem hai. Main phone band kar rakha tha, switch off tha, abhi on kiya hai.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Kal baat kar sake apne kal, theek hai?
Executive: Chalo, kal kis samay laga lu main? 11 baje ke aas paas laga lu?
Customer: Jab marzi kar lena, kal 10, 10 baje ke baad jab marzi kar lena kal.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai. Dhanyawad.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wanted to arrange a welcome call/video meeting.
- Stated being busy due to a personal problem.
- Requested to reschedule the call for the next day.

Resolution:

- Agreed to reschedule the call for the next day.
- Asked to be called anytime after 10 AM.

Next Steps: 
- Issue not resolved.
- Executive will call the customer the next day after 10 AM.

Alert (If Any):
None

@@@Sentiment:
- Annoyed -> Neutral

@@@Key Topics:
- welcome call, video meeting, rescheduling call, account manager
